description: Translate only rows where landtype has an nfl value
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

translation_rules: pe_pei01_countOfNotNull({species_1, species_2, species_3, species_4, species_5}, landtype, layer, 'FALSE')
description: Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Custom function decides if NFL layer is present based on rules in NFL table.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
